channel.title: Spin on radu's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Spin on radu's blog

item.title: Introducing Fermyon Serverless AI
item.author: radu@matei.ai (Radu Matei)
item.description: Fermyon Serverless AI gives you the building blocks for integrating Artificial Intelligence into your serverless applications, with AI inferencing for Large Language Models (LLMs) for Llama2 and CodeLlama, support for generating sentence embeddings and storing them in a vector-ready database, built-in key-value storage, and a seamless developer experience.

item.title: Spin 1.0 â€” The Developer Tool for Serverless WebAssembly
item.author: radu@matei.ai (Radu Matei)
item.description: Introducing the first stable release for Spin, the open source developer tool for building, distributing, and running serverless applications built with WebAssembly.
